remarks: The mapping of indices of edges containing a given vertex into the set of vertices is 1-1.  The index is mapped to the other vertex of the edge containing the vertex N. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)
statement:
usgraidx2v.a $e |- A = { x e. dom E | N e. ( E ` x ) } $.
usgraidx2v.f $e |- F = ( y e. A |-> ( iota_ z e. V ( E ` y ) = { z , N } ) ) $.
usgraidx2v $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ N e. V ) -> F : A -1-1-> V ) $.
$d A y $.
$d E x y z $.
$d E y z $.
$d N x y z $.
$d N y z $.
$d V y z $.
$d x z $.
